records.Name: RA-000014
records.Follow_Up_Notes__c: ohn is currently managing Type 2 diabetes and hypertension. He requires daily administration of Metformin and Lisinopril. Blood glucose levels are generally stable, though he requires periodic monitoring before meals. There are no known allergies, but he has a history of mild osteoarthritis in both knees, which is managed with PRN analgesics as required.
